Title: King invites PM and leaders of devolved governments to Windsor Castle
Description: King Charles will host the prime minister and the first ministers of the devolved governments at Windsor Castle on Wednesday night, Sky News understands.

Title: Russia releases American teacher jailed over medicinal cannabis after more than three years
Description: An American teacher sentenced to 14 years in a Russian jail has been released and is flying home to be reunited with his family.

Title: Deputy PM insists housing target can be met as extra £350m pledged for affordable homes
Description: Angela Rayner has insisted the government can meet its target to build 1.5m homes over the next five years as ministers pledged an extra £350m for housebuilding.

Title: Heathrow set to announce multibillion-pound investment - as it prepares proposal for third runway
Description: Heathrow is set to announce a multibillion-pound expansion plan to create extra capacity at the airport - as it prepares its proposal for a third runway.

Title: It was the day in court Spain had been waiting for - but Luis Rubiales' case goes beyond a kiss
Description: This was the day Spain - but most of all Jenni Hermoso - had been waiting for.

Title: Labour suspends 11 councillors over WhatsApp scandal
Description: The Labour Party has suspended 11 of its councillors over their membership of a WhatsApp group that led to a minister being sacked from the frontbench.

Title: Football clubs told to 'reconcile conscience' over Rwanda sponsorship deal
Description: Three of the world's biggest football clubs are being urged to drop their sponsorship deals with Visit Rwanda by the government of neighbouring Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC).

Title: British steel 'absolutely has a future' despite US tariffs, says deputy PM
Description: Steel 'absolutely has a future' in the UK despite Donald Trump's tariffs, the deputy prime minister has said.

Title: CCTV to be installed in Parliament bar after drink-spiking allegation
Description: Parliament's famous Strangers' Bar, closed in January after a drink-spiking allegation, is to reopen with CCTV cameras as part of a major security crackdown.

Title: Salman Rushdie describes moment of attack as he gives evidence in court
Description: Salman Rushdie has described in court the moment he was attacked on stage.

Title: Israeli PM says Gaza ceasefire 'will be terminated' if hostages are not returned by Hamas on Saturday
Description: The Gaza ceasefire will end if Hamas does not return Israeli hostages by midday on Saturday, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has said.

Title: Historic blow' to Sicilian mafia after more than 180 arrests
Description: Italian police have arrested 181 people in a crackdown on the Sicilian mafia.

Title: US defence secretary works out with marines ahead of first NATO meeting
Description: US defence secretary Pete Hegseth has posted pictures of himself exercising with American marines in Germany ahead of his first NATO meeting this week.

Title: Sue Gray takes up seat in House of Lords - and receives new title
Description: Sir Keir Starmer's former chief of staff Sue Gray has taken up her place in the House of Lords after she was nominated by the prime minister for a peerage.

Title: UK needs 'cool and clear-headed' response to Trump tariffs on British steel
Description: The UK needs a 'cool and clear-headed' response to Donald Trump imposing 25% tariffs on British steel exports, the trade minister has said.

Title: Has Elon Musk just put OpenAI in a tricky situation?
Description: The AI summit in Paris is a coming together of world leaders and technology firms designed to shape a responsible and sustainable future for artificial intelligence.

Title: Post-mortem results reveal injuries of British couple found dead at home in France
Description: Police investigating the deaths of a British couple at their home in rural France have released details from a post-mortem examination.

Title: In China's Silicon Valley, where the founder of DeepSeek keeps a low profile
Description: The city of Hangzhou in southern China is one of the country's leading technology hubs, and home to the groundbreaking artificial intelligence (AI) company DeepSeek.

Title: The new, even unlikely partnerships that Europe could forge in response to Trump's tariffs
Description: The European Union owes its origins to a trade agreement that involved coal and steel.

Title: Rubiales 'absolutely sure' World Cup kiss with Spain's Hermoso was consensual
Description: Former Spanish football chief Luis Rubiales has told a court that he was 'absolutely sure' player Jenni Hermoso consented to him kissing her.
